movies.title: Pokemon: Pikachu's Rescue Adventure
movies.plot: Ash, Brock and Misty are tired and settle down for a mid-day nap. All the Pokemon take a nap also. Suddenly, a flock of Ladyba flys by and awakens Toegpi. So entranced is she by the sight of them she follows them. Togepi of course does not pay attention to where she is going. She falls into a hole and enters a magical Pokemon world. Pikachu awakens and finds Togepi gone, and immedietely sets out to find her. They follow her down the hole she has fallen into and Pikachu's Rescue Adventure begins. There we see all kinds of Pokemon gathered together. They all help Pikachu and friends to help find little Togepi. This wonderful little adventure is entirely in what I like to call Poke-speak (with the exception of beginning and end very briefly Ash and friends speak). Otherwise, it's all about the Pokemon.
movies.simplePlot: Togepi leads Pikachu and friends on a wild adventure.

biography.bio: Ikue Ôtani was born on August 18, 1965 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), My Neighbor Totoro (1988) and Pokémon (1997).
biography.name: Ikue Ôtani

biography.bio: Rikako Aikawa was born on October 7, 1967 in Kanagawa, Japan as Nahomi Kawazoe. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Kaiketsu zorori (2004) and Paprika (2006). She is married to Mitsuo Iwata.
biography.name: Rikako Aikawa

biography.bio: Madeleine Blaustein was born on October 9, 1960 in Queens, New York, USA as Adam Seth Blaustein. She was an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998) and Pokémon: The Movie 2000 (1999). She died on December 11, 2008 in Jersey City, New Jersey, USA.
biography.name: Madeleine Blaustein

biography.bio: Megumi Hayashibara was born on March 30, 1967 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Paprika (2006), Cowboy Bebop: The Movie (2001) and Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion (1997). She has been married to Amiya Masaharu since April 30, 1998.
biography.name: Megumi Hayashibara

biography.bio: Mayumi Iizuka was born on January 3, 1977 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon: The Movie 2000 (1999) and Only Yesterday (1991).
biography.name: Mayumi Iizuka

biography.bio: Inuko Inuyama was born on December 16, 1965 in Tokyo, Japan as Chie Tozuka. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon the Series: Ruby and Sapphire (2002) and Pokémon the Series: Diamond and Pearl (2006).
biography.name: Inuko Inuyama

biography.bio: Mika Kanai was born on March 18, 1964 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Kaitou Saint Tail (1995) and Hinamizawa, le village maudit (2006). She was previously married to Kôichi Yamadera.
biography.name: Mika Kanai

biography.bio: Katsuyuki Konishi was born on April 21, 1973 in Wakayama, Japan. He is an actor, known for D.Gray-man (2006), Blood+ (2005) and Transformers: Energon (2004).
biography.name: Katsuyuki Konishi

biography.bio: Etsuko Kozakura was born on February 22, 1971 in Mizuho-cho, Nishitama-gun, Tokyo, Japan as Kumi Uchino. She is an actress, known for Pokémon the Series: Diamond and Pearl (2006), Noiseman Sound Insect (1997) and Kaleido Star (2003). She is married to Jin Domon.
biography.name: Etsuko Kozakura

biography.bio: Satomi Kôrogi was born on November 14, 1966 in Chiba, Japan. She is an actress, known for Paprika (2006), Pokémon (1997) and Twin Princess of Wonder Planet (2005).
biography.name: Satomi Kôrogi

biography.bio: Ted Lewis was born on October 18, 1969 in Bellingham, Massachusetts, USA as Edmund P. Lewis. He is an actor and writer, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998) and Pokémon: Stadium (1999).
biography.name: Ted Lewis

biography.bio: Rachael Lillis was born on July 8, 1978 in Niagara Falls, New York, USA. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998) and Pokémon 3: The Movie (2000).
biography.name: Rachael Lillis

biography.bio: Rica Matsumoto was born on November 30, 1968 in Yokohama, Japan. She is an actress, known for Perfect Blue (1997), Pokémon (1997) and Pokémon: The Movie 2000 (1999).
biography.name: Rica Matsumoto

biography.bio: Shin'ichirô Miki was born on March 18, 1968 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon (1997) and Pokémon the Series: Ruby and Sapphire (2002).
biography.name: Shin'ichirô Miki

biography.bio: Masako Nozawa was born on October 25, 1936 in Nippori, Arakawa, Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Dragon Ball Z (1989), Dragon Ball Z Kai (2009) and The Gutsy Frog (1972). She was previously married to Masaaki Tsukada.
biography.name: Masako Nozawa
